descriptionHtml:
I enjoy having Alva with me when I play as a vampire. She is just such a great character. This makes her look more like the cunning, seducing vampire her personality and story portrays. 

Note that the blue eyes are not included here. That\'s a quick fix I have for my own Skyrim. She\'ll have the standard vampire eyes upon installation. 

As with my other mods, for most accurate results, install Apachii hair and Coverwomen look 1.
author: Jawsofhana
